name: Worm (YourBest_Nightmare, Morgan)
description: Have you ever wanted to be a worm? Wondered what it was like to live in the nice cool dirt, hiding from predators  while also being an important part of the ecosystem?? Have you ever wondered if your partner would still be with you if you were a worm?? Well look no further than WORM: a 2023 Global Game Jam submission based on the theme of "roots."
